text.section: For a certificate of release of any lien imposed by this chapter, a certificate of discharge of any property subject to any lien imposed by this chapter, or a certificate that particular property is free of any lien imposed by this chapter.
For a certificate showing no tax is due under this chapter as a result of the death of a specified decedent.
For a copy of a computation sheet showing the computation of the tax due under this chapter as a result of the death of a specified decedent.
For a certificate showing the amount of tax paid under this chapter.
For a duplicate copy of a notice of assessment showing the amount of any tax assessed under this chapter.
For a duplicate copy of a receipt showing the amount of any tax paid under this chapter.
